revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR1200 |revision=v1.0 |series=AC1200 |upc=655216006430 |asin=B00DZIY8C0 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |availability=now |est_release_date=08/2013 |fcc_date=11/18/2013 |fcc_id=A8JESR1200 |ic_id=10103A-ESR1200 |pcb_id=7016A071100g |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9557;QCA9557-AT4A, PNU184.002B, 1311, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9557;QCA9557-AT4A, PNU184.002B, 1311, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=88:DC:96 |oui_eth=88:DC:96 }} {{TagLine|Dual Band Wireless AC1200 Router}} :''with Gigabit Ports and USB'' :[http://engeniustech.com/home-networking/routers/16742-esr1200 Product page] {{•}} [http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ESR1200_DS_071013.pdf Datasheet]
The FCC ID on the label of this device is apparently A8JESR900 on at least some units. :The filings for FCC ID do indeed mention the ESR1200 and ESR1750 within the test report… :but only 802.11n rates seem to be tested (there is no mention of 80MHz/VHT modes) :and the photos cover the ESR900 only (w/ its 3x3 11an AR9580 radio). A FCC ID specifically for the device (A8JESR1200) should be available on newer units. :"7016A071100g V1.00" is silkscreened on the board of the unit shown for this FCC ID.
Default SSIDs would appear to follow the pattern of '''EnGeniusXXXXXX''' for both bands.
Additional specifications, per ''EnGenius'''s product page, follow: *Weight: 0.5 lbs *Diameter: 6.36" *Height: 1.64"
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32212-engenius-esr1200-dual-band-wireless-ac1200-cloud-gigabit-router-with-usb-and-enshare-reviewed ''EnGenius ESR1200 Router Review'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32178-engenius-launches-80211ac-line ''EnGenius Launches 802.11ac Line'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
